name: Shotgun Kelly
description:
This game is about shooting in the opposite side to move in the desired side, to survive you will have to avoid spikes and to win you will have to get to the trophy at the end! Currently there are only 3 levels (As I did not have enough time to make more) but once we start getting feedback we may add more!

Controls AWSD Keys
  1. A Key - Boost to the Right
  2. D Key - Boost to the Left
  3. W Key - Boost Down
  4. S key - Boost Up
Notice

This game was made in a short time span and hence might be buggy as play testing was hard to achieve. We would love any feedback! 

If you want to support the game you can download the paid files, Thanks.

Happy Gaming SocialSide
